medical_history.chief_complaint: Gripping sensation in abdomen for 1 month.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 month ago, worsened over the past days. Pain worsens with coughing and twisting movements, worse in the left upper quadrant. Pain was not exacerbated by car trips. The patient reports subjective fevers and chills, reduced appetite, and weight loss.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, Hyperlipidemia, Colonic polyps s/p polypectomy, Diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon and distal descending colon, Alcohol abuse, Skin tags.
